bio: C# Programmer who want to do the best job as he can!
contributionDescription: In my job ( I can't reveal the name of one of the big companies) I do work with Optimism API to make a nice APP! It will be a breaking thing regarding the adoption! I do also share links and bridge info in our group chat on Telegram. Also privately I am currently working on a solution (startup) regarding private finances that will use OP chain for Web3 login. Maybe in a future I will add more features with this chain.
impactDescription: I think that impact is very big in my professional job. As I am working for a corporate I can't share details but the impact will be really big soon! I think next year we will have a release if everything goes well! In our work we do hardly utilizes all the features of the OptimizmAPI.

impactMetrics.description: Predicted number of people using website

pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for violating the Grant program rule 1: Promises of future impact. The application promises the release of substantial application updates and hints at a large audience base in future, without providing concrete measurable impact.
pwCategorySuggestions: Layer 2 Scaling, Smart Contract Platforms, Web3 Community Platform, Blockchain Infrastructure
